pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, October 2, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Vancouver, British Columbia

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement. A media availability will follow.

Fairmont Pacific Rim Hotel, Third Floor
1038 Canada Place

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to present themselves to the Emerald C room on the third floor no later than 7:45 a.m.
